1, ‘This Act may be cited as the Civil Procedure Code Short tiite, (Amendment) Act, No, 6 of 1993

2, Section 55 of the Civil Procedure Code (hereinafter ‘Amendment referred to as the “principal enactment”) is hereby 55 of amended in subsection (1) thereof, by the substitution, Chapter 102, for all the words from “to the Fiseal of the court or” io “actual service thereof has been entrusted.” of the following :-—

“to the Fiseal of the court or to a Fiseal of a ‘ court of like jurisdiction within the local limits of whose furisdictfon the defendant resides or to the Grama Niladhari within whose division the defendant resides, who shall cause the same to be duly served on the defendant, or on each defendant, if more than one, and shall as hereinafter provided, return the same and the execution thereof to the court, duly verified, in the case of a summons delivered to 2 Fiscal, by the officer to wham the . actual service thereof has been entrusted, or in the case of a summons delivered to a Grama Niladheri, by such Grama Niladhari.”,

& Section 60 of the principal enactment is hereby Amendment amended by the substitution, for the words “the Fiscal” Sane wherever that word occurs in that section, of the words principal “the Fiscal or the Grama Niladhari, as the case may be,”»  °™#etment
